channel.title: Zammy, guthix, saradomin statues
channel.description:
how do i add them and make them give a certain amount of strength, attack, defence xp evertime u click them '
also a 3 second time delay would be nice
anyone know the code or something
cuz i need object training
also targets and something that trains magic as well
please i really need them

item.title: Zammy, guthix, saradomin statues
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Make sure this is under your Object Click 1 packet, or as m 1 k 3 said 2 or 3.

Read full topic

item.title: Zammy, guthix, saradomin statues
item.dc:creator: @x_m_1_k_3_x x m 1 k 3 x
item.description:
@x_m_1_k_3_x wrote:

To be honest, object training is pathetic. It ruins the economy. And also, do you even know what your adding it under? It has to be under the objectClick 1-3 packet…Hense you click it once, twice, or three until the effect the work. If you can’t program this correctly into your source, I honestly don’t know what to tell you.

case ####: sendMessage(""); addSkillXP(EXP, SkillID); setAnimation(AnimID); }

Something to that matter…

Read full topic

item.title: Zammy, guthix, saradomin statues
item.dc:creator: @zoro35 zoro35
item.description:
@zoro35 wrote:

Well where your addXP is it says the skill ID is 99. Which is not an ID. That could be the problem
Here are lvlID list

playerLevel[0] = Attack playerLevel[1] = Defence playerLevel[2] = Strength playerLevel[3] = Hitpoints playerLevel[4] = Range playerLevel[5] = Prayer playerLevel[6] = Magic playerLevel[7] = Cooking playerLevel[8] = WoodCutting playerLevel[9] = Fletching playerLevel[10] = Fishing playerLevel[11] = Firemaking playerLevel[12] = Crafting playerLevel[13] = Smithing playerLevel[14] = Mining playerLevel[15] = Herblore playerLevel[16] = Agility playerLevel[17] = Thieving playerLevel[18] = Slayer playerLevel[19] = Farming playerLevel[20] = Runecrafting

Also dont make an uppercase B on break;

Read full topic

addSkillXP((&&&& * playerLevel[LVID]), LVID);

item.title: Zammy, guthix, saradomin statues
item.dc:creator: @zoro35 zoro35
item.description:
@zoro35 wrote:

Yes your are forgetting to break dude soz that was my mistake. Make it this

case 2873: // Zamorak
            if (actionTimer == 0)    
                addSkillXP(40000, 0); // Add 40k XP to Strength Skill
                addItem(995, 17500); // Add's 17.5k cash
                sendMessage("You Gain Str3ngth Xp.");   
                setAnimation(733); // Animation
                actionTimer = 10;
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
                break;
            


	   case 2874: // Saradomin
            if (actionTimer == 0)    
                addSkillXP(50000, 0); // Add 50k XP to Attack Skill
                addItem(995, 15000); // Add's 15k cash
                sendMessage("You Gain Some Att4ck Xp.");   
                setAnimation(733); // Animation
                actionTimer = 10;
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true; 
                break;
            


	   case 2875: // Guthix
            if (actionTimer == 0)    
                addSkillXP(60000, 0); // Add 60k XP to Defence Skill
                addItem(995, 10000); // Adds 10k cash
                sendMessage("You Gain Def3nce Xp.");   
                setAnimation(733); // Animation
                actionTimer = 10;
                updateRequired = true;
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true
                break;

If you get an error say ‘;’ expected just put a ; where ever it tells you to obviously

Legit- Not sure. Id have to modify and look at it for a little bit. If I get it I’ll post

Read full topic

item.title: Zammy, guthix, saradomin statues
item.dc:creator: @zoro35 zoro35
item.description:
@zoro35 wrote:

Ok, I’ll do the best I can without breaking the rules of “spoon feeding”

Search for each case i.e.

case 2873
case 2874

ETC.

Let start with Sara. Search for it in you cases and if you see it chances are it will look like this

        case 2873:
            TakeCape("Saradomin", 16, 99, 16, 5000, 2412, 1, 60, 645);
            resetanim = 6;  
            break;

Replace it with

case 2873:
            if (actionTimer == 0) {    
                addSkillXP((AMOUNTOFEXP, LEVELID);
                addItem(ITEMID, #OFITEMSWANTED);
                sendMessage("Message You Want To Send To The Player.");    
                setAnimation(733);
                actionTimer = 10;
                updateRequired = true; 
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            }

The addItem is optional. You can change it around to make it only give exp like this

case 2873:
            if (actionTimer == 0) {    
                addSkillXP((10000, 0);
                sendMessage("Message You Want To Send To The Player.");    
                setAnimation(733);
                actionTimer = 10;
                updateRequired = true; 
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            }

You can change the exp amounts and stuff. Just play with it until you get it right

Read full topic

case 2873: // Zamorak if (actionTimer == 0) { addSkillXP(1000, 0); // Add 1k XP to Attack Skill addItem(861, 1); // Add's 1 Magic Shortbow sendMessage("OMG. L33T h4xz0r."); setAnimation(733); // Animation actionTimer = 10; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

@zoro35 wrote:

Got that code from me he just edited it a little. and if you want it to do other stuff make it this

case ####:
            if (actionTimer == 0) {    
                addSkillXP((&&&& * playerLevel[LVID]), LVID);
                addItem(@@@@, $$$$);
                sendMessage("Message You Want To Send To The Player.");    
                setAnimation(733);
                actionTimer = 10;
                updateRequired = true; 
                appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
            }

item.title: Zammy, guthix, saradomin statues
item.dc:creator: @flipmc flipmc
item.description:
@flipmc wrote:

Get the Object ID (case ####).
And add XP. Like so;

case 2873: // Object ID anim(645); // Animation Send("You pray to Saradomin..."); addSkillXP(10000, 0); // Add 10k XP to Attack Send("You gain some Attack XP!"); break; }

Read full topic
